examples.sentence: Counter System Basics - How counters work

sections.heading: What is 杯 (はい/ばい/ぱい)?
sections.content:
杯 is the counter for cups, glasses, and bowls containing drinks or food. It follows the same sound change pattern as 本 and 匹.

コーヒーを2杯飲みました "I drank 2 cups of coffee" ビールを3杯ください "3 beers, please"

sections.heading: Complete 杯 Counter Chart
sections.content: | Number | Reading | Romaji | Sound | | ------ | ---------- | -------- | ----- | | 1 | いっぱい | ippai | ぱい | | 2 | にはい | ni-hai | はい | | 3 | さんばい | san-bai | ばい | | 4 | よんはい | yon-hai | はい | | 5 | ごはい | go-hai | はい | | 6 | ろっぱい | roppai | ぱい | | 7 | ななはい | nana-hai | はい | | 8 | はっぱい | happai | ぱい | | 9 | きゅうはい | kyuu-hai | はい | | 10 | じゅっぱい | juppai | ぱい |

children.heading: Larger Numbers
children.content: 11杯 = じゅういっぱい 20杯 = にじゅっぱい 100杯 = ひゃっぱい

children.heading: はい (hai) - Default
children.content: 2杯 (にはい) 4杯 (よんはい) 5杯 (ごはい) 7杯 (ななはい) 9杯 (きゅうはい)

children.heading: ばい (bai) - After ん sound
children.content: 3杯 (さんばい) - after さん

children.heading: ぱい (pai) - After っ sound
children.content: 1杯 (いっぱい) - いち becomes いっ 6杯 (ろっぱい) - ろく becomes ろっ 8杯 (はっぱい) - はち becomes はっ 10杯 (じゅっぱい) - じゅう becomes じゅっ

children.heading: Hot Drinks
children.content:
コーヒー - coffee お茶 - tea 紅茶 (こうちゃ) - black tea ココア - hot chocolate

コーヒーを1杯ください "One cup of coffee, please" お茶を2杯飲みました "I drank 2 cups of tea"

children.heading: Cold Drinks
children.content:
水 (みず) - water ジュース - juice ビール - beer ワイン - wine ソーダ - soda 牛乳 (ぎゅうにゅう) - milk

ビールを3杯飲んだ "I drank 3 beers" 水を1杯ください "A glass of water, please"

children.heading: Bowls of Food
children.content:
ご飯 (ごはん) - rice ラーメン - ramen スープ - soup 味噌汁 (みそしる) - miso soup うどん - udon そば - soba

ご飯を2杯食べました "I ate 2 bowls of rice" ラーメンを1杯食べたい "I want to eat a bowl of ramen"

sections.heading: Important: いっぱい Has Two Meanings!

children.heading: 1. One Cup/Glass (counter)
children.content: コーヒーを一杯ください "One coffee, please" ビールが一杯飲みたい "I want to drink one beer"

children.heading: 2. Full (adjective)
children.content:
コップがいっぱいです "The glass is full" お腹いっぱい "I'm full" (stomach) いっぱいある "There's a lot"

Context makes it clear which meaning!

children.heading: 何杯 (なんばい)
children.content: 何杯飲みましたか？ "How many cups did you drink?" コーヒーを何杯飲みますか？ "How many cups of coffee do you drink?" ご飯を何杯食べますか？ "How many bowls of rice will you eat?" ビールは何杯ですか？ "How many beers?"

children.heading: Drink + を + 杯 Counter
children.content: コーヒーを2杯飲みました "I drank 2 cups of coffee" ビールを3杯ください "3 beers, please" 水を1杯持ってきて "Bring me a glass of water"

children.heading: Subject + が + 杯 Counter + Verb
children.content: お茶が3杯あります "There are 3 cups of tea" ビールが2杯来ました "2 beers have arrived"

children.heading: 杯 Counter + の + Noun
children.content: 2杯のコーヒー "2 cups of coffee" 3杯のビール "3 beers" 1杯のお茶 "1 cup of tea"

children.heading: Example 1: Café
children.content: A: 何を飲みますか？ "What will you drink?" B: コーヒーを2杯ください "2 coffees, please" A: サイズは？ "What size?" B: 両方ラージで "Both large"

children.heading: Example 2: Restaurant
children.content: A: ビールは何杯お持ちしましょうか？ "How many beers shall I bring?" B: とりあえず3杯お願いします "3 for now, please" A: かしこまりました "Certainly"

children.heading: Example 3: At Home
children.content: A: お茶をもう一杯いかがですか？ "Would you like another cup of tea?" B: いいえ、もうお腹いっぱいです "No, I'm already full" A: そうですか "I see"

children.heading: Example 4: Eating Rice
children.content: A: ご飯のおかわりいかがですか？ "Would you like another bowl of rice?" B: はい、もう一杯ください "Yes, one more bowl please" A: どうぞ "Here you go"

children.heading: もう一杯 (another cup)
children.content: もう一杯ください "One more, please" もう一杯いかがですか？ "Would you like another cup?" もう一杯飲もう "Let's have another drink"

children.heading: 〜杯ずつ (each)
children.content: 一杯ずつ飲みましょう "Let's drink one each" 2杯ずつ注いでください "Please pour 2 cups each"

children.heading: 〜杯目 (ordinal)
children.content: 1杯目 (いっぱいめ) - the first cup 2杯目 (にはいめ) - the second cup 3杯目 (さんばいめ) - the third cup 2杯目のコーヒーが一番美味しかった "The second cup of coffee was the most delicious"

children.heading: 〜杯も (as many as)
children.content: 5杯も飲んだ "I drank as many as 5 cups" 10杯も食べた "I ate as many as 10 bowls"

children.heading: 〜杯しか (only)
children.content: 1杯しか飲んでいない "I've only drunk 1 cup" 2杯しか残っていない "Only 2 cups remain"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong sound changes
children.content: Wrong: いちはい (1) ❌ Right: いっぱい ✓ Wrong: さんはい (3) ❌ Right: さんばい ✓ Wrong: ろくはい (6) ❌ Right: ろっぱい ✓

children.heading: Mistake 2: Confusing いっぱい meanings
children.content: 一杯 = one cup (counter) いっぱい = full (adjective) Context is key!

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using wrong counter for bottles
children.content: Depends on context: ビール一杯 = one glass of beer ✓ ビール一本 = one bottle of beer ✓ Both can be correct!

children.heading: Mistake 4: Forgetting the counter
children.content: Wrong: コーヒーを2ください ❌ Right: コーヒーを2杯ください ✓ "2 coffees, please"

children.heading: 杯 - Served drinks (in cups/glasses)
children.content: ビールを2杯 "2 glasses of beer" コーヒーを1杯 "1 cup of coffee"

children.heading: 本 - Bottles/cans
children.content: ビールを2本 "2 bottles of beer" ペットボトルを3本 "3 plastic bottles"

children.heading: Basic
children.content: コーヒーを1杯ください "One coffee, please" お茶を2杯飲みました "I drank 2 cups of tea" ビールが3杯あります "There are 3 beers"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: 何杯飲みましたか？ "How many cups did you drink?" もう一杯いかがですか？ "Would you like another cup?" ご飯を2杯おかわりしました "I had 2 more bowls of rice"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: 毎日コーヒーを3杯飲みます "I drink 3 cups of coffee every day" ラーメンを2杯も食べてしまった "I ended up eating 2 whole bowls of ramen" 一杯ずつゆっくり飲みましょう "Let's drink slowly, one cup at a time"
